title: Roland Martin and Ryan Holiday
itunes:title: Roland Martin and Ryan Holiday
description:
Today on the show we had news commentator Roland Martin call in where they spoke about the upcoming political debate against Trump and Biden and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Lousianna police officer for shooting himself and caught hiding facts and next we had author Ryan Holiday call in to speak on his new book "Lives of the Stoics" where he mentions the characteristics of a stoic and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
